name: Hotel La Perle
address: 24 lane 42 Nguyen Cong Tru street, Huế, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở khu trung tâm ồn ào và náo nhiệt của thành phố Huế, Hotel La Perle cung cấp chỗ nghỉ thân thiện với môi trường bằng cách sử dụng năng lượng mặt trời. Khách sạn cung cấp nhà hàng trong khuôn viên và Wi-Fi miễn phí trong tất cả các khu vực.

Chỗ nghỉ cách Cố đô Huế khoảng 3 km, chợ Đông Ba sôi động 2,5 km và Chùa Thiên Mụ 6 km. Sân bay gần nhất là sân bay Phú Bài, cách khách sạn 14 km. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp dịch vụ đưa/đón sân bay, dịch vụ cho thuê xe máy và dịch vụ đưa đón với một khoản phụ phí.

Mỗi phòng nghỉ tại khách sạn này đều có máy điều hòa, truyền hình cáp và phòng tắm riêng.

Du khách có thể đến lễ tân 24 giờ để được cung cấp dịch vụ như thu đổi ngoại tệ, sắp xếp tour du lịch, đặt vé và trợ giúp đặc biệt. Khách sạn có quy trình phân loại rác và sử dụng giấy tái chế.

Du khách có thể thưởng thức trái cây tươi, cà phê, trà và nước uống tại nhà hàng trong khuôn viên.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Welcoming and attentive staff. Comfiest bed we have had in 12 months of travel. Super clean, comfortable and quiet room - would absolutely return next time we are in Hue.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Schönes Hotel mit überragendem Preis Leistung Verhältnis
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Leider hatten wir aus Zeitgründen nur eine Nacht im La Perle. Aber mit Hilfe der freundlichen Mitarbeiter wurden für uns eine Tour zu zwei Kaisergräbern und zur Zitadelle sowie unsere Weiterfahrt nach Hoi An am nächsten Tag innerhalb kürzester Zeit organisiert. Zimmer und Bad waren wirklich sauber, Betten sehr bequem. Frühstück wird auf Bestellung serviert. Man kann alles aus der Karte bestellen von Omelett über Pancake bis Müslie und Obstteller. War sehr gut! Wir würden jederzeit wieder hier übernachten.

review.comment_positive: Cama cómoda. Habitación de tamaño bastante decente, con escritorio armario, dos mesas de noche. Ducha caliente y con buena presión. El wifi funcionaba bien. Las chicas de recepción muy amables. Cogimos el tour a la zona desmilitarizada en el hotel, y fue todo muy bien y mismo precio que el oficial. Esta cerca del centro, pero en un callejón tranquilo.
review.comment_negative: La ventana de la habitación daba a la pared del edificio de al lado, que está a 1 metro (lo puedes tocar con la mano). Pero aún así entraba luz indirecta. La verdad es que no fue un inconveniente para nosotros, ya que era la habitación económica y hay muchos otros alojamientos en los que ni hay ventana.

Mình có thuê xe tại khách sạn nhưng do k kiểm tra trước lúc nhận xe, xe có bị hư hỏng 1 chút phần đầu bánh xe trước, nhân viên báo mình và mình có báo lại là k tai nạn, ks đã check lại và xin lỗi vì không phải lỗi của mình. Ngày cuối mình lấy xe đi từ rất sớm (4h sáng) bạn nhân viên và bác bảo vệ khách sạn vẫn nhiệt tình giúp đỡ. Khách sạn trong trung tâm, ngay cạnh phố đi bộ và rất gần các điểm thăm quan.

review.comment_positive: Замечательный отель, выглядит так как будто его построили недавно, все абсолютно новое. Находится на тихой улице. Вежливый персонал готовый помочь вам с любым вопросом. Номер чистый, тихий, есть все необходимое, выглядит точно как на фото. Завтрак отличный, вы можете заказать что угодно из меню и вам приготовят. Есть как вьетнамская еда, так и стандартный европейский завтрак (яйца, тосты, блины, мюсли, фрукты и тд.), все очень вкусно! Кофе , чай и бананы на ресепшене бесплатно в любое время. Если буду возвращаться в Хюэ, то только в этот отель.

review.comment_positive:
Great value Hotel! 

We stayed one night at La Perle Hotel. The next day we took the night train to Ninh Binh, as we didn't have a room anymore we asked if we could use a room to take a shower after a day of visiting Hue on the motorbike. This was no problem for the staff, they were extremely friendly and helpful!

Would recommend for everyone who is on a budget, great value hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Sin duda recomiendo al 100% alojarse en este hotel si visitáis Hue. De verdad que sólo tengo buenas palabras para las personas que trabajan allí. Sonrisas en sus caras todo el rato, hospitalidad máxima, es increíble lo bien que te tratan, lo limpio que lo tienen todo, el desayuno una maravilla, te dan mapa de Hue y te explican qué visitar, te ofrecer agua, fruta... De verdad, no tengo palabras!

review.comment_positive: La verdad solo tengo buenos comentarios de este hotel. La habitación era cómoda y estaba muy limpia. El desayuno es completo y muy rico también. En cuanto a los trabajadores quiero destacar que las chicas de recepción: Tho, Hoa y Ngoan son súper profesionales y muy simpáticas. En todo momento buscan que te sientas cómodo y siempre están dispuestas a ayudar. También he tenido la ocasión de conocer a Dung, el manager del hotel que también ha sido súper profesional. Mientras estábamos en Hue hubo una inundación, pero el hotel se encargó de que tuviésemos comida, que estuviésemos cómodos y de cualquier otra cosa que necesitábamos. Sin duda recomiendo mucho La Perle!

Hue La Perle Hotel

March 27-2023

Room 601 Romantic suite.

Easy check-in/check-out 

Great banana smoothie served 

as welcome drink.

Clear , easy to understand , explanations.

Room is superbly decorated, rose petals and swans on the bed. A dozen of fresh roses on the table.

Yesss truly romantic. Thanks.

Decent size room, immaculate bathroom.

Bed a bit too hard for me.

Friendly staff eager to help. Perfect location on the edge of the very busy tourist area. Minutes away from restaurants and bars and one walking street. I understand that La Perle has committed itself to a friendly environment approach. Bravo.

Outstanding price to quality ratio.

A small menu Breakfast served, from 7 am,  in the lobby with unique delicious choices.

Good Wifi.

A place to come back to.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Изумительный отель, начиная от чистоты в номере, заканчивая завтраком и персоналом.    

С самого начала нам дали небольшое введение от персонала: что посетить, где пообедать, рассказали все об отеле и об окружении. В номере вся мебель и сантехника новая, белоснежные простыни, очень чисто. И, что безумно порадовало: душевая отделена от остальной ванной. Было очень много розеток и они удобно расположены, было куда подключить всю мою технику для зарядки.

Убирались  каждый день тщательно и меняли белье. Завтрак тоже был чудный, можно выбрать из 7-8 блюд, все вкусно.

В общем, отличный отель за небольшие деньги, рекомендую.

Các bạn nhân viên rất là dễ thương,lịch sự, luôn hỗ trợ khách hàng. Cà phê của khách sạn ngon nên mẹ mình nhờ nhân viên chụp giùm hình ảnh để mua. Rất recommend cho các bạn khi có dịp du lịch đến Huế. Vị trí gần phố đi bộ, quán bún bò ngon.

review.comment_positive:
Absolutely brilliant service from all staff.  Ruby in particular - she welcomed us with cold towels and fresh mango juice when we arrived.  She sat down with us with a map and then clearly explained and wrote down our itinerary and costs for our 1.5 days there.  The hotel had communicated really well - by email directly (then WhatsApp) - what we might like to do and arranged our trips and our driver for the airport.  So professional.
Lovely clean room and bathroom.  I found the bed a bit hard on the first night so they added a mattress topper.  Free tea, coffee and bananas were available all day.  The location was good for local restaurants.
Amazing breakfast £2.50 for as much as you wanted from their menu, served to your table (no scrum for a buffet!).  Reception area gives a really good impression - nicely decorated and smiling reception staff.  Oh and they asked me if I'd like to borrow a hat!  Unbelievable service for such a good price, I don't know how they do it.
review.comment_negative: The room was a bit compact - I'm rubbish at understanding sizes when they're quoted per square foot.  But we had an economy room - I'd definitely upgrade to a bigger room unless you're on a tight budget.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
O hotel fica numa rua secundária com menor fluxo de carros e motos. A curta distância do Rio Perfume e das ruas que se tornam pedonais aos finais de semana a partir das 18h. 
As moças da recepção e do café da manhã são extremamente eficientes e simpaticas, fica registrado a minha gratidao a Hana e a outra recepcionista (que infelizmente agora não lembro o nome).
O quarto duplo sem sacada é de um tamanho bom, com cama confortável, travesseiros tambem, roupas de cama e toalhas de banho em dia (você pode optar por troca-las diariamente ou não) chuveiro muito bom, arcondicionado, ftigobar e chaleira funcionaram perfeitamente.
Há como cortesia no quarto um biscoitinho, café soluvel e cha e uma pequena jarra de água.
O hotel dispõe de elevador e serviço de lavanderia (um dos valores mais baixos no Vietna)
Você pode optar pelas diarias com café da manhã incluso ou não. Caso queira inclui-lo posteriormente, o valor é de 80.000 dongs e você pode pedir tudo do cardápio por esse valor (não é cada item).
O proprietário e o gerente também são muito simpáticos e têm a preocupação com o meio ambiente o que é possivel notar em cada detalhe da hospedagem
review.comment_negative: Três itens que não chegaram a prejudicar a estada mas vale a ressalva. Se a pessoa tiver dificuldade de locomoção, a rua do hotel não é totalmente plana, tendo algumas depressões. O quarto 503 da para uma propriedade....é possivel ver dentro da propriedade e vice versa, a iluminação mais clara na área do espelho seria otima

review.rating: Best hotel in Vietnam so far and by far the most wonderful staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
It has been the nicest hotel we have been to on our trip to Vietnam so far. And it has been one of the cheaper ones as well. The staff ist most wonderful. They let us check in extremely early (8 o'clock, because we came by sleeper bus), they helped us with very good tips, they remembered even little changes we asked for during breakfast on the first day and made sure it wasn't forgotten on the following day without us even mentioning it. 
Also: The breakfast is a la carte (with an extensive list of continental and Vietnamese options), all-you-can-eat, very tasty and freshly prepared. You can't ask for more.
review.comment_negative:
Like in most places in Vietnam, white laundry doesn't seem to get completely white (but ist smells fresh).
The room was a little small and we didn't really have a good place to put our big bagpacks.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Hạng Tiết Kiệm
review.comment_positive: El trato por parte del personal es increíble, en especial Ruby, la chica del desayuno y del jefe que también estaba en los desayunos; Desde nuestra llegada nos ayudaron en todo, rutas, maletas, nos ofrecieron té y bananas (lo cual también esta disponible gratis 24h), adaptaron el desayuno de forma vegetariana y gluten-free sin problema siendo este absolutamente delicioso, abundante y muy bonito decorado. En cuanto a la limpieza decir también que es exquisita, de lo mejorcito que hemos vivido en Vietnam, cuidan de todo detalle, muñecos cada día diferentes con las toallas, flores siempre frescas... como amenities tienes café, té y galletas de coco.La cama y las almohadas son gruesas y de alta dureza, lo cual en mi caso me encanta pero lo detallo porque es algo que no a todo el mundo le encaja. Hay un pequeño costurero (igual no es algo relevante pero a mí justo me sirvió, por ello lo menciono).
review.comment_negative: Necesita cortinas que no dejen pasar la luz algo súper importante que han de modificar, por lo que recomiendo llevar antifaz y que la habitacion económica no es demasiado amplia en comparación al resto de Vietnam.

review.rating: Home away from home, it's lovely!
review.room_type: Suite Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
The staff here were outstanding with everything, service, kindness, support, knowledge of places to visit and generally being wonderful.

They were genuinely kind hearted, they are an asset to La Perle.

Our rooms were clean, spacious and safe. 
Breakfast has a broad range of choice, you can choose as much as you want and it's made fresh to order, it included omlettes, Vietnamese dishes, panckes, smoothies and beautifully cut fruit. 

The tiny touches such as heart shaped fruit and towel animal on the beds ♥️. You get complimentary water and snacks a lovely bonus. 
We genuinely felt at home and looked after. 
There is an amazing cafe called The Nook opposite, you must go as many times as possible. 

This hotel is tucked away off the main streets where you will find everything you need!
review.comment_negative:
If I have to say something, I guess the beds were a bit hard and the cushions were too soft, not enough filling in them... 

There is some construction work opposite, it can get noisy, but this is out of the control of the hotel, just put in ear plugs! It's excellent value for money.

review.comment_positive: La Perle is a small friendly hotel in a great spot near the night walking streets in Hue. What a great find this place was! We stayed two nights in three very clean and well maintained rooms. Breakfast was also plentiful. All boxes ticked !

We will definitely stay again and can only recommend this hotel.

Auch ansonsten fanden wir das Personal außergewöhnlich freundlich und engagiert.
Unser Zimmer war tip top. Da gab es nichts zum Auszusetzen.
Das Frühstück war super. 
Leider waren wir nur eine Nacht dort. Wir wären gerne länger geblieben und würden jederzeit wieder kommen.

review.rating: Miglior hotel del nostro viaggio in Vietnam
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Hạng Tiết Kiệm
review.comment_positive:
Posizione ottima, vicina alla (poca) vita notturna e comoda alle attrazioni principali, che vanno comunque raggiunte in auto.
Reception e camere sono nuove, moderne e pulitissime. 
La colazione è buona e a buon mercato. 
Tè, caffè, banane e liquori alle erbe sono gratuiti e sempre a disposizione in reception.
Lo staff è eccezionale per simpatia, cortesia e disponibilità. Devo ringraziare in particolare Tho, Hanna e Sarah che ci hanno dato supporto per l'organizzazione delle escursioni e che sono anche rimaste in hotel ben dopo il loro orario lavorativo per reperirci una guida !!! 
In generale è stato il migliore hotel del nostro viaggio in Vietnam. Ci tornerei sicuramente.

P.S: Al momento della partenza le ragazze della reception ci hanno regalato due sacchetti di banane perché hanno notato che le abbiamo particolarmente apprezzate :) !!!

review.rating: 10 mal 10 Sterne! Ich wäre gerne länger geblieben
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Einfach alles! Es ist besser als beschrieben und auf den Bildern dargestellt. 
Super Wohlfühl-Atmosphäre! 
Die Zimmer sind sehr sauber, ruhig und hell und haben eine hervorragende Klimaanlage. Die Dusche hat einen guten Wasserdruck und hervorragend heißes Wasser. 
Außergewöhnlich und wirklich hervorzuheben sind alle Mitarbeiter. Sie sind sehr besorgt und kümmern sich um alles. 
Besonders Sarah möchte ich für die hervorragende und unaufdringliche Beratung zu meinen Wünschen, was ich in Hue machen möchte danken. 
So hat sie mir schon vorab hervorragende Tipps gegeben und Touren angeboten, mit denen ich in kurzer Zeit alles (und noch mehr, als ich dachte 😁) in und um Hue sehen konnte. Eine Tour war sogar günstiger als in getyourguide. 
Sarah ist so liebenswürdig und freundlich. Sie nahm mich auch bei der Ankunft in Empfang und gab mir weitere Tipps zu Restaurants, was ich sonst noch machen könnte und der Gegend um das Hotel herum.
Beinahe hätte ich es vergessen. Auch das Frühstück war sehr lecker, frisch gekocht und von der Karte (so viel man wollte)
Danke auch an Conny vom Service. 
Ich würde jederzeit wiederkommen!

review.rating: Tolles und sehr sauberes Hotel mit sehr freundlichen Angestellten
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel La Perle ist ein tolles und sehr sauberes, gepflegtes Hotel. Die Lage ist zentral. In der direkten Umgebung in Laufnähe befinden sich zahlreiche Restaurants und Cafés. Die Angestellten sind sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit, sehr aufmerksam und haben immer ein Lächeln auf den Lippen. Der Service ist großartig.  Das Frühstück kann man sich aus einer Karte zusammenstellen, wobei man verschiedene Speisen, Obst und Getränke beliebig oft nachbestellen kann. Unser Zimmer war liebevoll eingerichtet.
Alles in allem ein sehr gutes Preis/Leistungsverhältnis.

review.comment_positive:

+ Nettes Personal
+ Gutes Frühstück mit einer Auswahl an unterschiedlichen Gerichten 
+ Erfrischungstuch & Willkommens-Smoothie
review.comment_negative:
- Das Personal hat einen regelrecht ausgefragt nach seinen weiteren Reiseplänen, wie Zielen und Transportmitteln.
- Noch während man den Smoothie trinkt wird man direkt belagert und man bekommt Seightseeing- und Restauranttipps, was nach einer langen Anreise einfach unpassend ist.
- Daher hat man leider ständig das Gefühl, dass es dem Personal nur darum geht, weitere Touren oder Transporte zu verkaufen.

review.comment_positive: Alojamiento céntrico , muy limpio y con desayuno muy completo. El personal encantador y muy atento. Al llegar al hotel te ofrecen algo de beber y la chica “de recepción Ngcoc nos explico los puntos turísticos claves de Hue, nos recomendó restaurantes de comida local y también el desplazamiento para ir de Hue a Hoi an que se podía contratar en el propio hotel. Dicho traslado lo hicimos con TNT travel en BUS por 300.000 dongs por persona e incluía varias paradas: puente Thanh Toan  Bridge con visita a mercado local, An Lagoon, Hai Van Passy Marble Mountain.  Hotel muy recomendable, volvería a repetir mi estancia allí .

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
EVERYTHING! Specially the customer service. We were recieved by the manager, who explained the tours and the transportation services they offered. They gave us a lovely fruit cocktail as a welcome and gave us a delicious green tea with a nutty smell to say goodbye. There was always a crew of lovely ladies at the reception ready to help and smile. The breakfast was absolutely delicious and carefully made. The bathroom was the best I have found so far in my hotels in Vietnam... the shower has a DOOR!! I love it. Most of bathrooms in Vietnam don't have shower door and the water goes everywhere and makes a mess... not in this hotel.
The room super clean and quiet. The hotel located on a quiet street but yet close to everything. We walked to the Imperial Citadel, to the market and we really didn't need to pay for transportation.
They helped us with the limo service to our next stop in Da Nang. Fair price too as the hotel itself.
The reception was under construction but it didn't matter to me and in two more days will be ready and for you to enjoy... looked like is going to be beautiful.
I would come back to this hotel for sure.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
Suite Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
This was our favourite hotel we stayed in during our month in Vietnam. The staff are incredible, so so helpful with any requests. They suggested spots to visit, organised a motorbike for us, laundry, helped my husband repair his cracked phone screen. 

The room was lovely exactly as the pictures show, really clean, was so nice having a shower over bath for a change so the floors don't get wet. 
Breakfast was really nice, plenty of options.

It's in the perfect location, one street over from all the main restaurants and bars but you can't hear any of the noise. There's plenty of cheap eats within walking distance as well as attractions.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Hạng Tiết Kiệm

review.rating: Olimme hieman hukassa, mutta henkilökunnalla oli aina ratkaisu.
review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Hotellihenkilökunta oli ensiluokkainen! Me emme olleet varanneet jatkoyhteyttä Hoi Aniin, ja useat bussit olivat jo täynnä tai oli liian myöhäistä varata internetin kautta. Hotellihenkilökunta lopulta hankki meille kyydin Hoi Aniin samaan hintaan mitä internetissä oli. Lisäksi saavuimme hyvin aikaisin aamulla hotelliin, mutta aikainen sisäänkirjautuminen ei myöskään tuottanut ongelmia (ei edes lisämaksua). Söimme aamiaista sekä saimme pienen infopakkauksen Huen kaupungista, ja siinä ajassa huoneemme oli valmis. Muutenkin hotellihenkilökunta oli aina iloisella tuulella ja valmiina auttamaan miten vain.

Aamiainen oli myös erittäin hyvä. Listasta saa valita mitä tahansa niin paljon kuin haluaa aamiaiseksi 80,000 dongin hintaan (taisi olla halvempi jos tilaa etukäteen).
review.comment_negative: Vastakkaisella puolella katua oli käynnissä remontti, joka herätti meidät 7.00 aamulla. Meillä olisi ollut herätys puolelta, joten ei niin haitannut, mutta silti äänieristys huoneessa on heikko.

review.rating: Great value stay; excellent customer service and attention
review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The reception/front office staff were very helpful. Ms. Ruby booked our onward transfer to Phong Nga on a tour bus which gave us a stop at La Vang where there is a Marian Shrine. She was able to get us front seats too! Ms.Hoa welcomed us, and briefed us on the nearby attractions and eateries. She was on duty when we departed, wanted to carry out carry on to the bus waiting on the main road, about 400m away. We declined her offer, and she turned up on a scooter to ensure everything was okay. What a customer service from the hotel staff!!

The room was spacious, AC effective, good shower strength. Two lifts that were fast and sizable. There was good options for breakfast and while our special rate booking did not include breakfast, the 80K per person was reasonable enough as we didn’t have to walk out and we could order anything from the menu.

review.comment_positive: The staff were so so kind, extremely helpful with check-in, coordinating transportation, even drawing us a map of the city. They were even very well versed in english, and provided complimentary drinks during check-in. The rooms were also very clean.
review.comment_negative: There were no blankets, only a sheet. The bed was hard and because the room is powered with the room card, it was extremely stuffy and humid whenever we reentered the room. The bathroom is perpetually humid and minimally ventilated. Some of the power sockets are also fake. And the ones that work are too close to light switches making you have to stay still or my charging block would hit the switch. The metal pipe in the shower gets very hot so try not to touch it. The walls are pretty thin but not that much of an issue.

review.comment_positive: Una gran decepción. Lo único que salvaría es a la recepcionista, que no tiene culpa de nada.
review.comment_negative:
Creo que ha sido la peor experiencia de mi vida en un hotel. Buscábamos algo económico para pasar la noche y ahora que ha pasado me parece hasta caro.  La ducha no era estanca y se salia el agua por todos lados. 
Las fotos del hotel son engañosas. No hay gimnasio por ejemplo (pese a ponerlo en las fotos). Al llegar nos comentaron que tenían una especie de acuerdo con uno, pero que solo para algunos tipos de habitación "business"s. 
Todo es muy muy ruidoso. El aire acondicionado, la nevera .. no ha sido nada cómodo.
Me gusta más resaltar las virtudes que los defectos, pero realmente ha sido muy mala experiencia. Lo siento.

El personal es muy profesional y súper amable. Hablan todas bien inglés y son muy serviciales. Nos recibieron muy bien, nos explicaron con un mapa todo lo que había para hacer en la ciudad. Incluso, nos ofrecieron una habitación por un par de horas para ducharnos antes de ir a la estación, de noche, después del check-out cuando estábamos mojados por la lluvia y sin que lo pidiéramos. El desayuno era muy completo y rico, el hotel y la habitación estaban limpios y la ubicación, muy buena. Superó completamente nuestras expectativas.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Amazing staff, they spoke great english and were very kind and attentive. (Haven’t seen many smiles in Vietnam, but I was sure to get a lot of them at the reception).
The room was great as well, just like the pictures. And the location was very calm even though it was right next to the bustling pedestrian street area (no noise at all at night time). Breakfast was great as well with a lot of options to chose from. I did not have a specific plan when I arrived, and the receptionist helped me book a great tour of the imperial tombs, the pagoda and the imperial citadel. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Le petit déjeuner à volonté, les smoothies, thés et bananes à volonté pendant la journée, le prêt de parapluies.
L'emplacement et le calme, le confort de la chambre, le tri des déchets.

La vue à l'extérieur de la chambre sur un mur.

review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The courteous & caring staff,  cleanliness of the room and dining area. 
The location, it's in a narrow lane but taxis do drop you at the door step of the hotel. It's just 5-7 mins walk from the walking streets and 10-12 mins walk from the river front. Yet, so quiet. 
The reception, dining area, room upholstery and upkeep was most welcoming. 
The breakfast was very sumptuous with good variety.
The staff helped us to plan and  arrange the itinerary for sight seeing, 
Our every need was properly taken care of.
Wet towel, welcome drink and free bananas was a very soothing experience.

the below comment is not related to the hotel itself: 
Vietnam is a very nice destination and such an interesting country to explore, secure and budget friendly; its population is very kind and friendly. However, local people as well as the government authorities, should be more aware and concerned of the pollution and litter issues on street, green areas and beaches by putting on some more eco-friendly politics, such as reducing the usage of plastic (shopping bags, straw, plastic cups etc).

Hotel is very near to lots of bars and restaurants, location is good. Overall perfect experience, I highly recommend the place.

review.comment_positive:
Everything.
We have stayed there before but this time we were more overwhelmed. There would be a programmed energy maintenance and so we would be cut off completely of energy, meaning: no elevator. Exactly at the time said on a warning in the elevator, the light went off. But 1 minute later, the manager appeared to help us with the luggage. Amazing! More over, the taxi he called for us to the airport was cheaper than the one we got from the airport to the hotel and the driver drove carefully all the way.

Again, the breakfast was super (varyed and "copieux".)
Everything extremely clean, staff polited and willing to help us to every single thing.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDABLE !

Really good value for money!

review.comment_positive: Die Lage war sehr gut und die Essensempfehlungen die uns gegeben wurden waren wunderbar. das Hotel hat uns einen Fluss Fahrt organisiert das hat ebenfalls sehr gut geklappt. Preis/Leistung ist nicht zu toppen! Frühstück war ebenfalls sehr gut man kann al a cart wählen und so viel bestellen wie man will :)

review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
We werden hartelijk ontvangen met een verfrissend sapje en bananen. Ook kregen we verfrissende doekjes.

In het voor traject werd er super gecommuniceerd door Ruby over onze wensen voor transfers naar en van het hotel. Tot in details en altijd zeer snel. Ongelooflijk waar ze allemaal rekening mee houdt.
Zelfs toen we vanuit het hotel de stad bezochten hield ze via WhatsApp contact met de vraag of het goed ging en wij nog wensen hadden.

De dames staan steeds klaar om je van dienst te zijn en onthouden zowel je naam als wat je wensen zijn bij bijvoorbeeld het ontbijt.
Kom je in het hotel aan na een dag uit krijg je meteen een glas verfrissend water. Ook maken ze (tegen betaling, ongeveer vnd 30000) overheerlijke verse smoothies.
Als het regent krijg je zelfs een paraplu mee.

Het ontbijt is ä la carte en ruim voldoende. Je kunt ook fruit krijgen en extra toast. Er zijn allerlei vers gemaakte sapjes wat het bijzonder maakt. Wij houden niet van strenge Vietnamese koffie. Dat lengden ze dagelijks aan met heet water.

De familiekamer was zeer ruim en voorzien van alle benodigdheden. Alles is schoon en fris. Zo ook de tweepersoonskamer. De badkamer heeft een regendouche, handdouche en kraanuitloop. Iedere dag waren de bedden opgemaakt met handdoek figuren.

Het hotel ligt op een zeer goede afstand van het uitgaansleven. Zo’n 300mtr lopen. Op vrijdag t/m zondag worden de wegen in het uitgaanscentrum afgesloten vanaf 18:00 uur voor gemotoriseerde voertuigen. Restaurants en winkels in overvloed. Twee restaurants bevelen wij aan op korte loopafstand: restaurant Gecko (Westers en Europees nr 27 Tripadvisor) en restaurant Madame Thu (Vietnamees nr 7 Tripadvisor). Met name in het weekend reserveren want het is er druk en gewild.

Zoekt u een private car dan bevelen wij mr. Hai aan met zijn 7-seater. Hij verteld met heel veel kennis van Hue en omgeving.

review.comment_positive: The location was good, and some of the staff were helpful
review.comment_negative:
we were shocked we were not made aware there was a building site right opposite the hotel. our room faced directly on to this and the maintenance noise was loud. so if you want a lye in I’d bring ear plugs. also the dust gets all over your shoes which is a pain to get out. The hotel should really make you aware of the maintenance work before hand as this affected our experience here massively.
The room could have done with a better clean, some dirt in the bath room and stains on the towels and bed sheets.
We also were advised by staff that we needed to check out the eve before as we had a early morning taxi (which was fine). we had some buiscuits and in the morning forgot to say (50vnd) so hardly expensive. the man on the desk rang our driver as the hotel had booked this and spoke to my partner really rudely demanding that we had them an not paid and had not told them, when it was an honest error due to checking out the night before and leaving early in a rush. he rang the driver a few times saying the same thing all of this at 5.45-6 am. I’m not sure if he expected us to turn around and miss our flight for 50vnd biscuit. we asked him to email the price and how to pay and we’d sort it straight away. (he never did) so it obviously wasn’t that urgent.
We didn’t want to leave with out paying encase he didn’t email so we gave the money to our taxi driver and he kindly dropped it off to ensure they were paid but we didn’t appreciate how rude he was especially first thing in the morning. we appreciate our fault we forgot to say we had a biscuit but If we had checked out in the morning it wouldn’t have been an issue and just the lack of customer service regarding that was quite shoddy.
overall quite a disappointing stay considering reviews.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: 位置好，離市區與一些tour接送點很近，搭計程車去皇城也很近。附近餐廳與按摩店也很多，有早餐可以選購，附近也有不錯的早餐店。工作人員非常親切周到，從訂房後就有主動連絡與加what's app詢問需不需要加購一些交通與tour，並且很有耐心的回覆所有的問題，比價與搭乘之後發現真的便宜、品質也不錯。一到飯店就有迎賓果汁，大廳也一直有無限量香蕉供應，匆忙出門沒吃早餐或想吃點水果的時候覺得很棒。甚至主動拿出地圖詢問我們的行程，並給予非常中肯有用的行程和餐廳建議。房間有問題也馬上跟我們去房間處理。透過通訊軟體詢問了洗衣，很便宜且馬上就回覆並送到房間。在外面透過通訊軟體還請旅館推薦按摩店，也的確是超棒的按摩店。覺得透過通訊軟體可以即時溝通詢問很棒，也彌補自己口語表達能力不順的窘境。到了預定的接送時間，還打電話提醒外出的我們，行李員還幫我們拉著行李到很近的巷口接送點，非常細心周到。

The room was bright, clean and comfortable. The breakfast is of western style, but still delicious. I had everything I needed and got a welcome drink upon arrival. Hanna, the receptionist took a great care of me. She sat with me upon arrival in the hotel lobby and gave me recommendations for where to go to eat and what to see around. I only stayed for 2 nights and I wish I had stayed longer. 
As I needed a bus transfer to Hoi An after Hue, she also kindly offered the possibility of a sightseeing tour on the way and recommended the most suitable option for me. I must say, she got it right and it was awesome! I will definitely stay again in La Perle, should I have the possibility to come to Hue.

review.comment_positive:
El trato por parte de todo el personal es increíble, atentos en todo momento, siempre con una sonrisa. Desde la recepcionista Hoa, Tho, Ngoan y la camarera Thi todas super amables y dispuestas a ayudarte en todo. 
La limpieza impecable, no falta detalle en la habitación, agua, plátanos gratis, café… hay hervidor de agua, secador,costurero… 
El desayuno excelente, a la carta, y se puede pedir tantos platos y bebidas como quieras. 
Nos recomendaron un sitio de masajes tipo spa y nuy bien también 
Nos tuvimos que quedar una noche más debido al temporal, y nos quedamos encantados 
Ubicación excelente
Sin duda si volvemos a Hue, volveremos a este hotel

review.rating: Amazing value and terrific hotel in Hue

review.comment_positive: A wonderful—and wonderfully managed—hotel in Hue. Great location. Room was very comfortable in all regards. The staff were extremely accommodating, helpful, and friendly. Early checkin was available (obviously the room needs to be available for that). The hotel services were excellent including a very nice breakfast (paid separately but a very good price) and recommended tours which were excellent and very competitively priced. A terrific value that I recommend highly.

review.rating: A Great Place to Stay in Hue
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Hạng Tiết Kiệm
review.comment_positive:
This is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in. The staff are so genuine, kind and caring. Nothing is too much trouble for them, and you are greeted so warmly every time they see you.

The location is great, surrounded my so many great places to eat, and just a short walk to the Perfume River and the Citadel. 

It is lovely and quiet and so comfortable, I slept very well here. The breakfast is also delicious, and they are happy to adapt it to suit your needs. They have both 'Asian style' noodle and rice dishes, and 'Western' style omelettes and toast. There is also homemade yoghurt, fresh tropical fruit and juices/ smoothies. 

As a woman travelling solo I felt very safe here. The staff are attentive to who is going in and out and there is a 24 hour front desk. The area feels very safe and I had no problems at all in Hue overall. 

 Overall I would highly recommend Hotel La Perle, and will be staying here if I visit Hue again!
